title: Do we no longer get notifications to replies for some reason?
body:
Because my button that comes up telling me when someone replies has been gone for a few days now, for no apparent reason.

https://image.prntscr.com/image/Hj4YvWv-TrS2-TBAX3l8xw.png

replies.body: press f5, normally brings it back, even if opening and closing the page doesnt

As far as i know it's connection based. Yours are broken now but mine are fine, mine were broken a few days ago but probs not yours and so on and so forth. DOn't think there's anything client side that can be done which kinda sucks tho, it's annoying af.

I've noticed that those buttons can be pretty unreliable. I end up with one or the other missing half the time, though I can usually get it to re-appear after a few times reloading the page.

I sent a ticket into support about this years ago, but so far nothing (talk about unreliable).
Yeah no that was normal, but now it is just... gone, it doesn't come back anymore.
